info.authenticated:
If you want to authenticate, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.minlength: Your e-mail is required to be at least 5 characters.
email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 50 characters.

validation.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than {{max}} characters.

validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.
